attributes.action: NUCLEAR POWER TO PAY BRITAINS DEBT PROBLEMS
attributes.additional_details: British Government to fund and create a Nationalised Nuclear power industry which will generate,and supply electricity for the whole of Britain. The cost to the consumer will be far less then what is being currently charged by foreign companies. The excess power sold abroad at the going rates, and profits used to service Britains debt, and fund such things as NHS, Police etc.
